comments:
I set width of a chart to 100.0 '%'. Then I double-click on the chart and play
with settings (on X-axis setting it to sorting, but doing nothing seems to work
as well).

As soon as I press ok and exit the modal dialog, the Width changes to 400.0
points instead of the 100%. 

This might happen on other properties as well.

Actually, Width returns to 400 points and Height 250 points regardless of what I
set it to in %.

Depend on #110667. Resolved with new UI

Since chart always requires an absolute width/height value for rendering, using
relative value may not cause the expected size, especially in HTML. So, using
absolute value is recommended. Anyway, it doesnt' overwrite the width/height
value set by user now.

traces.message: "fromUnits"must be one of the absolute units(CM, IN, MM, PT).

causedBy.message: "fromUnits"must be one of the absolute units(CM, IN, MM, PT).
